convert_buildings_to_fuel_flag.description: Flag to convert QUIC-URB buildings to fuel. 0 = do not convert, 1 = convert.

building_fuel_density.description: Thin fuel density within buildings if no fuel is specified and buildings are converted to fuel. Higher value = more fuel.

building_attenuation_coefficient.description: Attenuation coefficient within buildings if buildings are converted to fuel. Higher value = more drag.

building_surface_roughness.description: Surface roughness within buildings if buildings are converted to fuel. Higher value = lower wind speed.

convert_fuel_to_canopy_flag.description: Flag to convert fuel to canopy for winds. 0 = do not convert, 1 = convert.

update_canopy_winds_flag.description: Flag to update canopy winds when fuel is consumed. 0 = do not update, 1 = update.

fuel_attenuation_coefficient.description: Attenuation coefficient within fuel for the Cionco wind profile. Higher value = more drag.

fuel_surface_roughness.description: Surface roughness within fuel. Higher value = lower wind speed.
